arguments.info: server - (Optional) ID of ARM server to associate IP with

attributes.info: id - id of the new resource
ip - IP of the new resource

arguments.info: image - (Required) base image of ARM server
tags - (Optional) list of tags for server
security_group - (Optional) assign security group to server

attributes.info: id - id of the new resource
private_ip - private ip of the new resource
public_ip - public ip of the new resource
id - id of the new resource

arguments.info: protocol - (Required) protocol of rule (ICMP, TCP, UDP)

attributes.info: id - id of the new resource

arguments.info: size_in_gb - (Required) size of the volume in GB

attributes.info: id - id of the new resource

arguments.info: volume - (Required) id of the volume to be attached

attributes.info: id - id of the new resource
